entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING CLEAR
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
